entry.def: Something that is striped has stripes on it.

example.ex: ...a bottle green and maroon striped tie.
example.tran: 有深绿色和栗色条纹的领带

means.word_mean: 以条纹作标志的;有条纹的

sentences.en: The striped band round a policeman’s sleeve is to signify that he is on duty.
sentences.cn: 警察袖子上的袖标标明他正在执勤。

sentences.en: There is a striped sofa along the wall.
sentences.cn: 靠墙放着一个有条纹的沙发。

sentences.en: They had the hall done out in striped wallpaper.
sentences.cn: 他们在大厅贴了有条纹的墙纸。

sentences.en: His striped tie showed up well against his dark red shirt.
sentences.cn: 他那条纹领带在深红色的衬衫下十分醒目。

sentences.en: Jack’s plaid shirt didn’t mix well with his striped trousers.
sentences.cn: 杰克的方格衬衫与条纹长裤不相配。

sentences.en: Striped awnings had been stretched across the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 一些条纹雨篷撑开架在院子上方。
